0: Cluster 0 (102 pitchers) — Knuckle-Curve Specialist: average FF velocity (93.9 mph, +0.1 vs. league) and league-average FF spin (2284 rpm, +15). Arsenal: leans heavily on the knuckle-curve (18%, +17%), and avoids the curveball (-6%).
1: Cluster 1 (591 pitchers) — Mid-Velocity Slider Arm: average FF velocity (93.9 mph, +0.1 vs. league) and league-average FF spin (2275 rpm, +6). Arsenal: leans heavily on the slider (26%, +8%), and avoids the cutter (-7%).
2: Cluster 2 (154 pitchers) — Splitter Specialist: average FF velocity (94.4 mph, +0.6 vs. league) and league-average FF spin (2253 rpm, -16). Arsenal: leans heavily on the splitter (17%, +15%), and avoids the changeup (-8%).
3: Cluster 3 (72 pitchers) — Sinker Specialist: average SI velocity (93.2 mph, -0.6 vs. league) and league-average SI spin (2160 rpm, -109). Arsenal: leans heavily on the sinker (43%, +28%), cutter (16%, +9%), and avoids the four-seamer (-34%).
4: Cluster 4 (428 pitchers) — Mid-Velocity Cutter Arm: average FF velocity (93.4 mph, -0.4 vs. league) and league-average FF spin (2264 rpm, -5). Arsenal: leans heavily on the cutter (15%, +8%), and avoids the slider (-9%).
